title: 597-C
statement: C. Subsequencestime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputFor the given sequence withndifferent elements find the number of increasing subsequences withk+ 1elements. It is guaranteed that the answer is not greater than8·1018.InputFirst line contain two integer valuesnandk(1 ≤n≤ 105, 0 ≤k≤ 10)— the length of sequence and the number of elements in increasing subsequences.Nextnlines contains one integerai(1 ≤ai≤n) each — elements of sequence. All valuesaiare different.OutputPrint one integer — the answer to the problem.ExamplesInput5 212354Output7
